text: Inse jab kaha jata hai ke Allah ne jo ehkaam nazil kiye hain unki pairwi karo to jawab dete hain ke hum to usi tareeqe ki pairwi karenge jispar humne apne baap dada ko paya hai, accha agar inke baap dada ne aqal se kuch bhi kaam na liya ho aur raah e raast na payi ho to kya phir bhi yeh unhin ki pairwi kiye chale jayenge
